channel.title: Help me with windows firewall please :)
channel.description:
So like.I'm following every step to put my server online.I followed everystep.Got my no-ip.Server ready to be online(just doing a test :P). BUT! I can't click on change settings.WHY :|? I'm an admin on this computer and I'm the only account.How can i change this.Had no help with google.They talk about other things,etc. I need this because I changed my ip and everything in my server,but no response kuz i need to add a port in this settings.But won't let me open the CHANGE SETTINGS! :( HELP! THX! :D
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/580/m4a2.png/][IMG]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/9964/m4a2.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: Help me with windows firewall please :)

@imback4more wrote:

thx ;o servers up for a test drive

item.title: Help me with windows firewall please :)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Click on Allow another program, not change settings, that button is for when you click on one of the names of a program allowed through the firewall.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with windows firewall please :)

So like.I’m following every step to put my server online.I followed everystep.Got my no-ip.Server ready to be online(just doing a test :P). BUT! I can’t click on change settings.WHY :|?
